name: 约翰·安德鲁斯
name_full: 约翰·安德鲁斯 John Andrews
introduction: John Andrews is an actor living in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. He began honing his craft, acting as a background performer in many TV and film productions. This experience and great exposure to the industry sparked a desire to do more.John has performed in several feature films as well as short films and is constantly working on his craft and broadening his range as an actor. You can see him in his latest film Ash & Dust (2022).Stay tuned for more updates as they happen.
